content: प्रीतिः [प्री भावे क्तिच्] {@--1@} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} Pleasure, happiness, satisfaction, delight, gladness, joy, gratification; भुवनालोकनप्रीतिः <ls>Ku. 2. 45</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">6. 21</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 51</ls>; <ls>Me. 62.</ls> {@--2@} Favour, kindness. {@--3@} Love, affection, regard; <ls>Me. 4</ls>, <ls n="Me.">16</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 57</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 54.</ls> {@--4@} Liking or fondness for, delight in, addiction to; द्यूत°, मृगया°. {@--5@} Friendliness, amity. {@--6@} Conciliation. {@--7@} A symbolical expression for the letter ध. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of a wife of Cupid and rival of Rati; (सपत्नी संजाता रत्याः प्रीतिरिति श्रुता).
